commun sequenti process thi paper suggest that input and outputar basic primit of program and that parallel composit ofcommun sequenti process is a fundament program structur method whencombin with a develop of dijkstra s guard command theseconcept ar surprisingli versatil their us is illustr by samplsolut of a varieti of familiar program exercis cacm august1978 hoar c program program languag program primit program structurparallel program concurr input output guard command nondeterminaci coroutin procedurmultipl entri multipl exit class data represent recurs condit criticregion monitor iter arrai 4 20 4 22 4 32ca780805 dh februari 7 1979 10 07 am 249 43073 254 4 3073 272 4 3073 1102 4 30731109 4 3073 1140 4 3073 1188 4 3073 13064 3073 1323 4 3073 1358 4 3073 1380 43073 1464 4 3073 1491 4 3073 1665 4 30731767 4 3073 1781 4 3073 1781 4 3073 17874 3073 1787 4 3073 1949 4 3073 1989 43073 321 4 3073 2059 4 3073 2112 4 30732126 4 3073 2534 4 3073 2541 4 3073 4354 3073 437 4 3073 463 4 3073 483 43073 491 4 3073 2698 4 3073 2732 4 30732733 4 3073 2820 4 3073 2896 4 3073 29724 3073 560 4 3073 583 4 3073 3037 43073 3039 4 3073 3043 4 3073 3073 4 30733073 4 3073 3073 4 3073 3155 4 3073 6274 3073 631 4 3073 632 4 3073 642 43073 644 4 3073 653 4 3073 680 4 3073761 4 3073 762 4 3073 763 4 3073 1234 3073 140 4 3073 919 4 3073 989 43073 196 5 3073 2732 5 3073 3073 5 30733073 5 3073 3073 5 3073 3148 5 3073 31505 3073 3155 5 3073 799 5 3073 1860 63073 2060 6 3073 2204 6 3073 2247 6 30732704 6 3073 2817 6 3073 2842 6 3073 28656 3073 2939 6 3073 2939 6 3073 2940 63073 2941 6 3073 2943 6 3073 3073 6 30733073 6 3073 3073 6 3073 3148 6 3073 7996 3073
